title: 'This is a mistake President': Bill Ackman responds to Trump's call for a one-year 10% cap on credit card interest
full_text:
'This is a mistake President': Bill Ackman responds to Trump's call for a one-year 10% cap on credit card interest. President Donald Trump on Friday called for a 10% cap on credit card interest for one year.. PATRICK T. FALLON/AFP via Getty Images
  • Bill Ackman said President Donald Trump's call for a one-year cap on credit card interest was a "mistake."
